thread.section_title: Avis marchands de PAP | Avis - PAP | www.pap.fr | 6 sur 38
thread.title: Sham Syed

author: Sham Syed
title: Sham Syed
text: I am the Owner and Director of the USA Language Services a high level private American school for French executives. I put an ad; for a 2p apartment on rue du Charenton. 75012. It was like magic. I got about 500 emails and calls for this apartment (28.40m2 / 210 000€). It sold immediately for people told me that PAP had a very good reputation and went out of it's way to give correct information to both the buyer and seller. They expressed full confidence in PAP. If you need help to know more about how to sell through PAP; call me at 07 81 11 74 63 or 01 43 47 30 42. Bravo to the PAP Top brass and Team members;
